name: Hentai Cheerleader
description:
Hentai is not just 2D girls, it's a whole art. And units are understood in this art. The game "Hentai Cheerleader" is a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image. The game has hot levels as well as a gallery, after completing a level you can view your wins here. Hentai girls, this is a whole era of art.
Features of the game:
10 different, cute and sexy girls;
10 achievements;
Gallery;
Relaxing and romantic music;
